55typedef struct pj_activesock_cb
56{

85 pj_size_t size,
86 pj_status_t status,

111 const pj_sockaddr_t *src_addr,
112 int addr_len,
113 pj_status_t status);
114

129 pj_ioqueue_op_key_t *send_key,
